TextView.android:text:
* This is basically a library application. 
* The main functionality of this application is to ensure that the library facilities are readily available. 
* The screen which you initially view gives you the brief description of all the books. 
* You can search for a book by typing the keyword in relation with that book. 
*When you type a keyword in the search book section,the books related to that keyword are displayed. 
* If you are interested in borrowing a book, it's compulsory that you login.
 And if you are new user then you must register
